faq.question: How long does the trademark registration process take?
faq.answer: The trademark registration process in Indonesia usually takes 12-24 months from submission to certificate issuance. However, your trademark receives protection from the filing date.

faq.question: What documents are required?
faq.answer: Required documents include: applicant's ID/KTP, logo/trademark name to register, product/service description, and power of attorney (if using a consultant). We will help prepare all documents.

faq.question: Can my trademark be rejected?
faq.answer: Yes, trademarks can be rejected if they're similar to other registered trademarks, violate regulations, or don't meet requirements. Therefore, trademark search is crucial before filing.

benefits.description: Renewal is easier than new registration

process.title: Check Trademark Status
process.description: We check expiry date and your trademark status

process.title: Document Preparation
process.description: Prepare renewal documents and payment proof

faq.question: When should I renew my trademark?
faq.answer: Trademarks must be renewed every 10 years. It's best to renew 6 months before expiry to avoid penalties. If late, you can still renew up to 6 months after expiry with additional costs.

faq.question: How much does trademark renewal cost?
faq.answer: Trademark renewal costs depend on submission timing. If renewed before expiry, costs are lower. If late (6 months after expiry), there are additional government penalty fees.

faq.question: What happens if not renewed?
faq.answer: If trademark is not renewed past the grace period (6 months after expiry), your trademark will be removed from the registered trademark list and lose legal protection. Others can register the same trademark.

cetak_sertifikat.hero_subtitle: Get an official copy of your lost or damaged trademark certificate

benefits.title: Official Copy
benefits.description: Reissued certificates have the same legal force

benefits.title: Fast Process
benefits.description: No need to re-register, just request reprint

benefits.title: For Legal Purposes
benefits.description: Required for licensing, rights transfer, or other legal applications

process.title: Verify Trademark Data
process.description: We verify registration number and your trademark data

process.title: Process & Print
process.description: Wait for official certificate reprint process

faq.question: How long does certificate reprint take?
faq.answer: Trademark certificate reprint process usually takes 1-2 working weeks from application submission and approval by DJKI.

faq.question: Is the reprinted certificate the same as the original?
faq.answer: Yes, reprinted certificates have the same legal force as original certificates. Certificates will have 'Official Copy' stamp from DJKI.

faq.question: What are the requirements for certificate reprint?
faq.answer: Reprint requirements: trademark registration number, trademark owner's identity, and loss/damage statement (if required).
